Package com.rolledback.framework

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coordinate
    Basic implementation of a Coordinate class.
    FactoryOptionPane
    A FactoryOptionPane is created every time a human user clicks on a factory.
    Game
    The Game class contains all logic for running and displaying the game.
    GameGUI
    The GameGUI object is used to display info about the current Game.
    GraphicsManager
    The GraphicsManager loads and stores all grapical related objects for the game.
    Launcher
    This file is used to launch a basic standard instance of the game, execution of which starts inside the main method.
    Logger
    The logger class is used to debug the program.
    World
    The world class contains all information and objects concerning the actual tile/terrain of the Game class.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Game.GAME_STATE
